name: Kinky
description: Before the Cataclysm, your dirty mind was held back only by society. Now that it's gone, there's no reason not to indulge. Your morale is improved by wearing lewd clothing.

name: Lewd
mutagen_message: A tingling warmth spreads through your body...
iv_message: Your body feels so hot. So good.
iv_sound_message: You let out a loud moan.
//: Should be out for two minutes.
iv_sleep_message: You slip into a blissful trance...

name: Too Lewd
description: You sometimes look back on your days before your tail came in.  But you're better now.

name: Lovemaker (test)
description: You have full control of your vines, and can grow new ones and detach old ones more or less at will.

spawn_item.message: You detach a love from your body.
